View Pane

The lower right hand pane of the main Zelix KlassMaster window is the View pane. When an opened class has been selected in the Class Hierarchy Pane the View pane displays the field and method definitions of the class in a Java like format.
 
When a method's properties are being viewed the View pane displays the method's instructions in assembler. The mnemonics used in the assembler are based on those used in the Java Virtual Machine Specification.
